author: SteveL-MSFT
body: Whenever we reference new packages or existing packages add new assemblies, we go through a manual exercise to update source files.  This should be automated and manually reviewed.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
Whenever files.wxs is regenerated, The following properties about existing components cannot change or patching will be completely broken:

- Component Id
- Component GUID
- File Id
- File Name (the source path of the file, however, can change.  Although, the destination cannot change, but that is in a separate WXS file)

This assumes we stick to the WiX recommendation of one file per component.  If we don't, the rules become more complex.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: If the script find and report what lines we should remove or add why we can not edit the file automatically? It is not regeneration of the file from scratch.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @iSazonov basically, its just more work and it hasn't been done.  I'm just listing the requirements for the work, which may not be obvious.  We cannot just use the WiX toolset to generate the file and replace the existing file.

title: Create tooling to update files in packaging.psm1, files.wxs, pwrshcommon.cpp automatically
